challenges.title: Binary Search
challenges.description: Implement binary search on a sorted array.

submissions.description: Easy solve with Python's built-in bisect module.

hints.title: What is binary search
hints.description: Binary search is an efficient algorithm for finding an item from a sorted list of items.

challenges.title: Fibonacci Sequence
challenges.description: Generate the first N Fibonacci numbers using both recursive and iterative methods.

challenges.title: Matrix Multiplication
challenges.description: Multiply two matrices and return the resulting matrix.

challenges.title: Palindrome Checker
challenges.description: Check if a string is the same forwards and backwards.

challenges.title: Prime Number Checker
challenges.description: Determine if a given number is prime using efficient algorithms.

challenges.title: Calculator
challenges.description: Create a simple calculator that can perform basic arithmetic operations.

challenges.title: File Encryptor
challenges.description: Encrypt and decrypt a text file using a simple cipher algorithm.

challenges.title: Social Media Analyzer
challenges.description: Analyze social media posts for sentiment, keywords, and trends.

challenges.title: E-commerce System
challenges.description: Design a simple e-commerce system that allows users to view products and place orders.

challenges.title: Password Generator
challenges.description: Generate a random password based on specified criteria.
